paymentSteps.title: Payment Steps:
vodafoneCash: Your instructor will confirm the payment and activate your access
fawry: Visit any Fawry outlet (pharmacy, supermarket, etc.)
bankTransfer: Transfer to Bank: Commercial International Bank (CIB)

warnings.vodafoneCash: Make sure to send the exact amount ({{amount}} EGP) to avoid delays in processing.
warnings.fawry: Payment may take 24-48 hours to process. Keep your receipt safe.
warnings.bankTransfer: Bank transfers typically take 1-3 business days to process.
warnings.creditCard: Your payment is processed securely through our payment gateway.
warnings.other: Please contact our support team for specific payment instructions.

errors.invoiceNotFoundDescription: The invoice you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.
errors.invalidInvoiceDescription: This invoice is missing required item information.
errors.itemLoadErrorDescription: There was an error loading the item details. Please try refreshing the page.
errors.itemNotAvailable: Item information could not be loaded. The item may have been deleted or you may not have access to it.

authModal.signInDescription: Sign in to access your premium learning portal
authModal.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
authModal.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
authModal.byContinuing: By continuing, you agree to our

terms.welcome: Welcome to LRNFLIX LMS. By accessing our platform, you agree to these terms of service.
terms.acceptance: By using LRNFLIX LMS, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.userAccounts: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.acceptableUse: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose or to violate any applicable laws or regulations.
terms.intellectualProperty: All content on LRNFLIX LMS is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.termination: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms.

privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.informationCollection: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, enroll in courses, or contact us.
privacy.informationUsage: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure platform security.
privacy.informationSharing: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent.
privacy.dataSecurity: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access.
privacy.yourRights: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time.

help.gettingStarted: Welcome to LRNFLIX LMS! Here's how to get started with your learning journey.
help.creatingAccount: Click "Create Account" on the homepage and follow the simple registration process.
help.enrollingInCourses: Browse our course catalog and click "Enroll Now" on any course that interests you.
help.accessingCourses: Once enrolled, you can access your courses from your dashboard at any time.
help.technicalSupport: If you encounter technical issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
help.paymentIssues: For payment-related questions, please check your account settings or contact billing support.

contact.description: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the following channels.
contact.liveChatDescription: Available during business hours through our website chat widget.
contact.responseTimeDescription: We typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours during business days.
